description:
Replace a lost or broken lid, or turn your mug or tumbler into an insulated sippy-cup.

  • Honeycomb insulation helps keep your drink the right temperature
  • Press-in fit is splash-proof and easy to remove
  • Flexible straw for easy sipping. Do not use straw with hot drinks
  • Medium fits Hydro Flask mugs and Tumblers between 355ml and 592ml
name: Hydro Flask Press-In Straw Lid
